tooltips.los_clear_at_critical_point: Line of sight clear at critical point (margin {diff}m)

success.new_session_started: New session started. Ready to load a KMZ or draw on the map.
success.kmz_loaded_select_tower: KMZ file processed. Select the initial antenna for simulation.
success.pacman_pivot_created: Directional arc sector pivot "{name}" successfully created.
success.app_reset: Application reset. New session in progress.
success.tower_selected_for_simulation: Tower "{name}" selected. Run simulation in the panel.
success.location_found: Location found and marked on the map.

errors.session_start_fail: Critical failure to start new session. Please reload the page.
errors.invalid_data_or_session: Invalid data or session not started. Please restart the application.
errors.no_coverage_to_search: No active coverage area. Activate the main antenna or a repeater.
errors.session_not_started_for_draw: Session not started. Restart before drawing.
errors.session_not_started: Session not started. Load a KMZ or restart the application.
errors.nothing_to_export: No eligible data for export. Run a simulation first.
errors.los_diagnostic_fail: Line of sight diagnostic failed for target {name}.
errors.los_source_must_have_signal: ORIGIN: select a target (pivot or irripump) WITH signal.
errors.invalid_coordinate_format: Invalid coordinate format. Use DMS (e.g., 19¬∞26'S 44¬∞29'W) or Decimal (e.g., -19.44 -44.49).
errors.draw_pivot_radius_too_small: Radius too small. Drawing cancelled. Click for new center.
errors.template_load_fail: Failed to fetch templates. Check your connection.

info.no_towers_found: No antennas found in KMZ. Add manually by clicking on the map.
info.los_mode_on: 'Repeater Site Analysis' mode activated. Select an uncovered pivot.
info.target_pivot_selected: Target pivot selected: {name}. Searching for sites...
info.no_promising_sites_found: No promising sites found with current criteria.
info.draw_pivot_step1: Geographic Edit Mode: click to define pivot center.
info.draw_pivot_step2: Center defined. Click again to define radius.
info.draw_pivot_still_active: Edit Mode still active. Click for a new pivot.
info.analyzing_targets_from_source: Analyzing line of sight for {count} targets from "{source}"...
info.edit_mode_activated: Edit mode activated: drag pins or right-click to remove.
info.positions_updated_resimulate: Positions updated. Re-run simulation to see impact.
info.los_mode_step1_source: PIVOT-TO-PIVOT DIAGNOSTIC: select the ORIGIN target (with signal).
info.los_source_selected: ORIGIN: {name} selected. Now select the DESTINATION (without signal).
info.los_source_already_selected: ORIGIN: {name} is already the origin. Select the DESTINATION.
info.los_source_changed: ORIGIN changed to: {name}. Select the DESTINATION.
info.los_new_source_prompt: Select new ORIGIN (with signal) or deactivate mode.
info.draw_sector_pivot_step1: Sector Edit Mode: click to define the center.
info.draw_sector_pivot_step2: Center defined. Adjust radius/direction and click to finalize.
info.draw_sector_pivot_still_active: Sector Mode still active. Click for new pivot.
info.draw_pacman_step1: Directional Arc Sector Edit Mode: click to define the center.
info.draw_pacman_step2: Center defined. Click for radius and start angle.
info.draw_pacman_step3: Radius and start angle defined. Click for end angle.
info.draw_pacman_still_active: Arc Mode still active. Click for new pivot.
info.draw_irripump_step1: Irripump Add Mode: click to insert.
info.draw_irripump_still_active: Irripump Mode still active. Click for another.
info.find_repeater_long_process_warning: The search for repeater locations may take a minute or more. Please wait.

confirm.remove_pivot: Confirm deletion of pivot "{name}" and its associated areas?
confirm.change_los_source: ORIGIN is already {sourceName}. Change to {newName}? Diagnostic lines will be removed.
